Detailed Description

[depreciated] Overcomplication - only the response needs to be polymorphic. Holds data about a physical object.

Remarks:
For FusionShips this should be initialisd by the ShipFactory when it creates a new ship. It should remain indipendant of the ClientEnvironment after that point - all modification to it can be done manually, rather than requiring it to know of ShipResource.
See also:
FusionPhysicsBody

Member Data Documentation

float FusionEngine::FusionPhysicsProperties::m_RotationalVelocity
 

Current velocity of rotation.

Remarks:
(ShipResource has RotationVelocity [no 'al'], that being the maximum velocity of rotation.)
